meta-review.comment: Shadowrun Hong Kong Extended Edition proves once again that mixing cyberpunk and fantasy can result in an intriguing and immersive experience. Dive into the seedy underbelly of Hong Kong, take on shadowy missions, and customize your team to shake up the status quo. The turn-based combat and deep narrative will keep you hooked, and the extended edition brings even more content to the table. Join the shadows and get ready for a wild ride.
